detaileddescription.para: Describe various Tripal Core systems to Views
Ensures that all fields attached to TripalEntities use the proper handlers.
Integreates the Tripal fields with Views.
Provides the data array for the tripal job management system

parameterdescription.para: Previously generated tripal views data array return $data array with job management system described

detaileddescription.para: Integrates the TripalEntity entities with Drupal Views.
Integrates many of the core database tables with drupal views
